post:
Host1Plus is an international hosting provider, offering a range of services from web, VPS and reseller hosting to domain name registration and SSL certificates. The values Host1Plus owns today – reliability, tolerance, partnership - were rooted by their customers over the years of successful collaboration. Their team strives to ensure immaculate network stability, solid server reliability and excellent customer care.

Host1Plus.com is offering high quality web hosting services with a great discount!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CURRENT LIMITED TIME SPECIAL OFFER

Coupon: 40OFFWEB - current and new customers can receive 40% discount on any of our web hosting plans for unlimited time!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We offer 24/7 support via sales chat, phone or email, top of the line servers, global web hosting, free site move, 99.9% uptime guarantee across all services. Our staff is patient and always there to help in any way they can. If client faces any issues, they're resolved quickly and efficiently.

Data Center Locations

Host1Plus is an international web hosting company offering web hosting services worldwide.

You can select a shared hosting location in United States (Los Angeles, Chicago), United Kingdom (London), Germany (Frankfurt), Brazil (São Paulo), Netherlands (Amsterdam), South Africa (Johannesburg) and Lithuania (Šiauliai).

All web hosting plans include:

• Top of the line servers
• Global web hosting service
• 99.9% uptime guarantee
• 24/7 support via tickets or email (in English, Portuguese and Lithuanian)
• Unlimited email accounts
• Dedicated IP’s at $2/mo or $24/year (free in Business Pro plan)
• Free domain for all plans from 12 months billing cycle
• MySQL 5
• PostgreSQL
• cPanel and DirectAdmin
• Anti-virus
• Automatic system backups
